thread.section_title: Hubert Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hubert | hubert.com
thread.title: ZT

author: ZT
title: ZT
text: When there is a holdup with an account or an item goes on back order after being ordered, Hubert does a poor job of reaching out to the customer. When someone is expecting a 24-hour turn around for an order to ship, but it does not, Hubert relies on the customer to reach out for an update and then the live chat crew seems clueless as to why the customer is frustrated. If the status of an order changes or there is a problem with a payment, Hubert should reach out directly first.
